my.translation[0].definitions[0].definit: used by the person who is speaking to show that something belongs to or is connected with himself or herself
my.translation[0].definitions[0].example: Have you seen my car keys?
I’m sure you don’t want to listen to all my problems.
Even my own family wouldn’t believe me.
my.translation[1].definitions[0].definit: used when you are surprised, impressed, or upset
my.translation[1].definitions[0].example: My! Look at the size of that tree!
‘It’s 3.30.’ ‘Oh my, I’m going to be late!’
